title: Where am I? What happened?
text: I've woken up on a strange planet, a crashed wreck of a ship next to me. I'm battered and bruised, but nothing seems to be broken and the lifesupport on my exosuit is holding, guess I'm pretty lucky really.
Guess first thing I should do is fix my ship (I assume it's mine), then repair my exosuit's secondary functions, like the camera.
Hopefully this planet will have the materials I need.
